summary: This is an automated out-of-office reply email from an individual to Geoffrey Berman regarding the Epstein case and JMD media guidelines. It indicates communication about media handling related to the Epstein case within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: US Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of an out-of-office email regarding Epstein case and JMD media guidelines, indicating he was seeking communication or information on the topic.

events.title: Out-of-office email regarding Epstein media guidelines
events.description: An automated email reply indicates Geoffrey Berman attempted to contact someone regarding the Epstein case and JMD media guidelines, but the recipient was out of the office.

keyFacts: On June 28, 2019, Geoffrey Berman, the US Attorney for the Southern District of New York, was involved in communications regarding the Epstein case and JMD media guidelines.
The email is an automated out-of-office reply, indicating the intended recipient was unavailable that day.
The subject line references 'Epstein; JMD Media Guideline', suggesting discussions about media handling or public communications strategy related to the Epstein investigation.
